title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets across Southern Lebanon: An In-depth Analysis of Recent Combat Activities”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

In four different areas in southern Lebanon: The IDF attacked a series of terror targets of the terror organization Hezbollah

A short time ago, combat aircraft attacked a series of targets of the terror organization Hezbollah in four different areas in southern Lebanon. Among the targets attacked were a Hezbollah terrorist cell in the El Adaysse area, a launcher that was used by the organization in the Halta area, and military buildings of Hezbollah in the areas of Yarun, Maroun al-Ras and Aita al-Shaab in southern Lebanon.

Earlier today, a number of launches were identified crossing from Lebanon towards several areas in the north of the country, no injuries. IDF forces attacked the sources of fire with artillery.

Attached is documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/4dHAn0W
